Built for developers in order to make technology open to the world

Baythium Packer1.0.15

Effectively archive your large-scale infrastructure data using our powerful and lightweight command-line tool

DocsGithub Download

Features

We combine many useful tools in a single package so whether you are small company, large enterprise or a government entity, we have all of your business file management needs covered

Encryption

Protect your vulnerable data using the world-class encryption to keep your secrets safe

Compression

Take many files and compress them into one file, which is smaller than the combined size of the originals

Backup

Full enterprise backup with task schedulers and more

Cloud

Save your archived files to different cloud services

Open Source

Access to the source code and join our active community
